Package climatemonitoring.core

Class Application

java.lang.Object
climatemonitoring.core.Application
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApplicationGUI, ApplicationHeadless
public abstract class Application extends Object
Application is the main engine responsible for the main loop and its termination. An application can be either headless or GUI. There can only be one instance of this class throughout the program
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
adellafrattina

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application(ApplicationSpecification spec, int configuration)
      This constructor needs to be called once only. It is responsible of window creation (GUI mode only)
      Parameters:
      spec - The application specification
      configuration - The application configuration
      See Also:
      • ApplicationSpecification
      • Window

  • Method Details

    • getConfiguration

      public static int getConfiguration()
      Returns:
      The application configuration

    • isRunning

      public static boolean isRunning()
      To check whether the main loop is still running
      Returns:
      True if the application is still running, false if not

    • close

      public static void close()
      To notify the intention of terminating the application

    • getWidth

      public static int getWidth()
      Returns:
      The application's window width (GUI mode only)

    • getHeight

      public static int getHeight()
      Returns:
      The application's window height (GUI mode only)

    • pushLayer

      public void pushLayer(Layer layer)
      Adds another layer to be updated in the main loop. It runs the Layer.onAttach() method
      Parameters:
      layer - The layer to be added to the application
      See Also:
      • Layer

    • setFramerateLimit

      public static void setFramerateLimit(int framerate)
      To set a limit to the frame rate. By doing this, the application will not saturate the CPU and GPU by going as fast as it can. It is also recommended to use this method instead of relying on the ApplicationSpecification.vSync flag
      Parameters:
      framerate - The frame rate (it is recommended to set it above 60 fps)

    • run

      public abstract void run()
      It runs the main loop where all the layers are updated and the graphics is rendered or the cmd inputs are executed

    • shutdown

      public abstract void shutdown()
      Shuts down the application when close() method gets called
